newsitem.title: UK: Bank of Scotland unit prices mortgage-backed bond.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Scotland unit prices mortgage-backed bond.

text.p: BOS Shared Appreciation Mortgages (a subsidiary of Bank of Scotland ) has priced the first tranche of its two-tranche mortgage-backed bond, lead manager SBC Warburg said on Wednesday.
No. 1 PLC is a 27.2 million stg bond and No. 2 PLC is a 105.6 million stg structured FRN.
